name: Forgotten Beginnings: A New Afterlife Strategy Guide
description: Text file strategy guide for the game Forgotten Beginnings: A New Afterlife.

name: 借春天 Echo of Spring
description: A first-person VR puzzle game centered on "emotional narrative + embodied interaction." Through object exploration and immersive actions, you will enter the consciousness of five girls, piece together their emotional journeys, and make your own choices at the crossroads of fate.

name: 自宅警備員のお仕事
description: A self-proclaimed "stay-at-home security officer" lives a lazy life in a small apartment. But one day, a letter from Mom ends it all. Choose your actions by clicking, and watch the 2D story branch with each decision.

name: DayDream Mosaics Juliette's Collection
description: A beautiful collection of six-color nonogram puzzles from the Daydream Mosaics series. Play in classic picross style or the enhanced Mosaic mode with power-ups and mistake tracking. Packed with vibrant logic challenges—perfect for puzzle fans of all kinds.

name: Living With a Little Fox Girl
description: Care for a local shrine and befriend Mao, the fox girl who lives there. In this light-hearted simulation game, you’ll have 30 days to balance your time between your tasks and building a relationship with Mao. Use your time wisely, and who knows? Maybe she'll let you stay longer.
